title: RussianEnglishTranslation
author: RussianEnglishTranslation
content: There is an airdrop going on right now and a beta testers program where you can earn $CNDL coins. It's a new L1 blockchain designed for metaverses, including their own. Visit CandleLabs.org to claim your free coins. For the devs out there, there is also a generous developer bounty/grant program available. The first round of bounties have been paid out but there will be consecutive rounds. The next phase of testing is for their AMM swap DApp.

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: You can also learn more about the project on their new website cndlchaindotcom.

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: The airdrop isn't here. You need to go to the website and fill out the claim form.

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: No need to paste anything here, the bounty campaign is linked in the first post. We can discuss the chain and project itself here. What Candle Chain is doing is revolutionary. There is only one other public blockchain with 0 fees besides Candle and that's IOTA, which is highly centralized and uses a coordinator. Initial Candle Chain POS rewards should launch around 800%.
